Protecting Paesyn, advanced to the heart of Energia Celo, killing every monster that arose.
On the way, witnessed the tragic scene of captured Parthians being transformed into demokrons.
Zolyn appeared with her mercenaries, asking to free the captives while she and her soldiers advanced to wipe out the archdevan guards.
However, when and Paesyn followed Zolyn, they had to witness an even more tragic scene...

What? No, I'm going with you! Zolyn says you're very important—part of a prophecy!

If you get in trouble, I can go get help!"I...okay. But stay back until it's safe."

How many guards do you think there are?

Do you think maybe we should wait for Zolyn?"I'm going in—I heard prisoners in there. Stay here."

Thanks for keeping Paesyn safe. I guess he's kind of...grown on me.

Okay, down to business: I'll take my soldiers in to capture the lab. You find a way to release these prisoners.

Oh, and don't mention this to Rhodos! All of these test subjects are Parthians—his people. Rhodos would go berserk to see them like this."I understand. I'll join you when I'm finished."

We have to save her!

I'm not leaving until we get her back!

You're supposed to be a hero! You're supposed to be THE hero! The prophecy! Mystel's "chosen one!"

HELP ME GET HER BACK!"There's nothing we can do from here. I'm sorry."

I have arrived both in time...and too late. I am sorry that your friend Zolyn could not be saved, but take heart: Mystel has prophesied that you will see her again.

Now, to address your role in events: That machine in the middle of the room regulates the Storm Barrier. It cannot be shut down...but it can be overloaded.

Pull the lever, and it will destroy itself."It will be my pleasure."

The regulator is going to explode!

We should depart without delay."Come on, Paesyn...it's time to go."
